clearcontrol.core.string

Class MemorySizeFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.string.MemorySizeFormat

  • public class MemorySizeFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Formats a memory size in bytes by automatically changing the scale from bytes, to kilobytes, megabytes and gigatbytes.
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(double pSizeInBytes,
                                      boolean pShortForm)
        Returns a formatted string for a given size in bytes. if the short form is chosen, 'Bytes' will be replaced by 'B', and so one for 'KiloBytes' to 'KB'...
        Parameters:
        pSizeInBytes - size in bytes
        pShortForm - short form flag
        Returns:
        formatted string
